r.s: Provides missing functionality for older versions of PHP.
r.d:
PHP_Compat provides missing functionality in the form of Constants and Functions for older versions of PHP.
Constants: * E_STRICT * PATH_SEPERATOR * STDIN, STDOUT, STDERR * FILE_USE_INCLUDE_PATH, FILE_IGNORE_NEW_LINES, FILE_SKIP_EMPTY_LINES, FILE_APPEND, FILE_NO_DEFAULT_CONTEXT
Functions: * array_combine * file_get_contents * file_put_contents * http_build_query * is_a * scandir * str_split * fprintf * stripos * strripos * str_ireplace
r.n:
Added more components: * fprintf * stripos * strripos * str_ireplace * FILE (The filesystem constants) * STD (The commandline constants)
Removed the seperate files for STDIN/STDOUT/STDERR Removed the seperate files for FILE_USE_INCLUDE_PATH/FILE_APPEND
